mapper.select: SELECT poda.amount amount, psp.unit unit, CONCAT((0+CAST(amount AS CHAR)),unit) number FROM produce_order_detail_aps poda LEFT JOIN product_store_plm psp ON poda.prod_no = psp.prod_no AND poda.company_id = psp.company_id AND psp.deleted ='F' LEFT JOIN produce_order_aps poa ON poa.inside_order = poda.inside_order AND poa.company_id = poda.company_id AND poa.deleted = 'F' WHERE psp.wares_no = #{waresNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND poa.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND poda.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND poda.deleted = 'F'
